ya10.3.4:1.1: » Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānāti so domanassindriyaṁ pajahitthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.4:2.1: « Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṁ pajahittha so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānātīti?
ya10.3.4:3.1: Dve puggalā domanassindriyaṁ pajahittha, no ca cakkhundriyaṁ parijānanti. Aggamaggasamaṅgī domanassindriyañca pajahittha cakkhundriyañca parijānāti.
ya10.3.4:4.1: » Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānāti so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.4:5.1: « Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānātīti?
ya10.3.4:6.1: Cha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvittha, no ca cakkhundriyaṁ parijānanti. Aggamaggasamaṅgī anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvittha cakkhundriyañca parijānāti.
ya10.3.4:7.1: » Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānāti so aññindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti? No.
ya10.3.4:8.1: « Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānātīti? No.
ya10.3.4:9.1: » Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānāti so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikaritthāti? No.
ya10.3.4:10.1: « Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarittha so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānātīti? No. (Cakkhundriyamūlakaṁ.)
ya10.3.4:11.1: » Yo domanassindriyaṁ pajahati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.4:12.1: « Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṁ pajahatīti?
ya10.3.4:13.1: Cha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvittha, no ca domanassindriyaṁ pajahanti. Anāgāmimaggasamaṅgī anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvittha domanassindriyañca pajahati.
ya10.3.4:14.1: » Yo domanassindriyaṁ pajahati so aññindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti? No.
ya10.3.4:15.1: « Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṁ pajahatīti? No.
ya10.3.4:16.1: » Yo domanassindriyaṁ pajahati so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikaritthāti? No.
ya10.3.4:17.1: « Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarittha so domanassindriyaṁ pajahatīti? No. (Domanassindriyamūlakaṁ.)
ya10.3.4:18.1: » Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāveti so aññindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti? No.
ya10.3.4:19.1: « Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ bhāvittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvetīti? No.
ya10.3.4:20.1: » Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikaritthāti? No.
ya10.3.4:21.1: « Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvetīti? No. (Anaññātaññassāmītindriyamūlakaṁ.)
ya10.3.4:22.1: » Yo aññindriyaṁ bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikaritthāti? No.
ya10.3.4:23.1: « Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarittha so aññindriyaṁ bhāvetīti? No. (Aññindriyamūlakaṁ.)
ya10.3.4:24.1: » Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahitthāti?
ya10.3.4:25.1: Dve puggalā cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānanti, no ca domanassindriyaṁ nappajahittha. Cha puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti domanassindriyañca nappajahittha.
ya10.3.4:26.1: « Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṁ nappajahittha so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānātīti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.4:27.1: » Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.4:28.1: Cha puggalā cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvittha. Dve puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.4:29.1: « Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānātīti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.4:30.1: » Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.4:31.1: Arahā cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti, no ca aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha. Satta puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti aññindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.4:32.1: « Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānātīti?
ya10.3.4:33.1: Aggamaggasamaṅgī aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha, no ca cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti. Satta puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvittha cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti.
ya10.3.4:34.1: » Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.4:35.1: Arahā cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti, no ca aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha. Aṭṭha puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha.
ya10.3.4:36.1: « Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānātīti?
ya10.3.4:37.1: Aggamaggasamaṅgī aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha, no ca cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti. Aṭṭha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti. (Cakkhundriyamūlakaṁ.)
ya10.3.4:38.1: » Yo domanassindriyaṁ nappajahati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.4:39.1: Cha puggalā domanassindriyaṁ nappajahanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvittha. Dve puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.4:40.1: « Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahatīti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.4:41.1: » Yo domanassindriyaṁ nappajahati so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.4:42.1: Arahā domanassindriyaṁ nappajahati, no ca aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha. Satta puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahanti aññindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.4:43.1: « Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahatīti?
ya10.3.4:44.1: Anāgāmimaggasamaṅgī aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha, no ca domanassindriyaṁ nappajahati. Satta puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvittha domanassindriyañca nappajahanti.
ya10.3.4:45.1: » Yo domanassindriyaṁ nappajahati so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.4:46.1: Arahā domanassindriyaṁ nappajahati, no ca aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha. Aṭṭha puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahanti aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha.
ya10.3.4:47.1: « Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahatīti?
ya10.3.4:48.1: Anāgāmimaggasamaṅgī aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha, no ca domanassindriyaṁ nappajahati. Aṭṭha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha domanassindriyañca nappajahanti. (Domanassindriyamūlakaṁ.)
ya10.3.4:49.1: » Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāveti so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.4:50.1: Arahā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāveti, no ca aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha. Satta puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi aññindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.4:51.1: « Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvetīti?
ya10.3.4:52.1: Aṭṭhamako aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāveti. Satta puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi.
ya10.3.4:53.1: » Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.4:54.1: Arahā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāveti, no ca aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha. Aṭṭha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha.
ya10.3.4:55.1: « Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvetīti?
ya10.3.4:56.1: Aṭṭhamako aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāveti. Aṭṭha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi. (Anaññātaññassāmītindriyamūlakaṁ.)
ya10.3.4:57.1: » Yo aññindriyaṁ na bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.4:58.1: Arahā aññindriyaṁ na bhāveti, no ca aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha. Cha puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāventi aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha.
ya10.3.4:59.1: « Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvetīti?
ya10.3.4:60.1: Tayo maggasamaṅgino aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha, no ca aññindriyaṁ na bhāventi. Cha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha aññindriyañca na bhāventi. (Aññindriyamūlakaṁ.)
